title: 30-pun de Wakaru! Kore made no Love Live! Sunshine!!
original_name: 30 分でわかる！これまでのラブライブ！サンシャイン!!
sinopse: Web-exclusive recaps of Love Live! Sunshine!!, originally released on Love Live! Series Official YouTube channel to promote Love Live! Sunshine!! The School Idol Movie: Over the Rainbow. Each episode recaps each season respectively.
